review_data.title: Great cocktails, excellent service!
review_data.content: Delicious gin-based cocktails, large variety. Amazing service, very competent and attentive. Good price.

review_data.title: Favourite bar
review_data.content: My favourite bar in Zurich! Fantastic drinks, super nice staff and cozy atmosphere. Prices are average for Zurich, around 18fr for a cocktail. Mocktails also available.

review_data.title: Gin tasting in kreis 4
review_data.content: Great cocktail bar specialized in Gin. Nice location, in a quiet alley in Kreis 4. Excellent Team, young, knowledgeable and friendly. Very good cocktails, well prepared with a fine selection of ingredients!

review_data.title: Gin Lovers aufgepasst!

And you don't only enjoy your drink in this warm atmosphere, but also you have the chance to learn about its ingredients-herbs, its history, origination! Unbelievable! review_data.title: For all Gin lovers

review_data.title: Cozy Bar with Excellent Service

review_data.title: Best Service in Switzerland - Little Gem

Extensive selection of alcohol and in particular flavoured gins. Some snacks are also available and prices are standard for Zurich. It's a small bar...More

review_data.title: Sehr authentisch

review_data.title: Curteous AF

review_data.title: That's one very cool place
review_data.content: Hosted by charming people, our cocktails were somptuous!! Try the Thai punch I promise... you won't regret it!

review_data.title: Ein Bijou unter den Bars in Zürich

review_data.title: A must go for Gin lovers
